metadata.title: CVE-2022-2182 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.description:
Heap-based Buffer Overflow in GitHub repository vim/vim prior to 8.2.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-2182` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

vim - 2:9.0.0135-1ubuntu1
vim-athena - 2:9.0.0135-1ubuntu1
vim-common - 2:9.0.0135-1ubuntu1
vim-gtk3 - 2:9.0.0135-1ubuntu1
vim-gui-common - 2:9.0.0135-1ubuntu1
vim-motif - 2:9.0.0135-1ubuntu1
vim-nox - 2:9.0.0135-1ubuntu1
vim-runtime - 2:9.0.0135-1ubuntu1
vim-tiny - 2:9.0.0135-1ubuntu1
xxd - 2:9.0.0135-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: vim package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2:9.0.0135-1ubuntu1').
